content: Soliciting opinions on our future course for FHIR R5: https://onfhir.hl7.org/2022/02/28/soliciting-feedback-concerning-the-roadmap-for-fhir-r5/. Please feel free to have your say

Based on the feedback received, we'll be following "Option 3" as our approach to FHIR R5. I.e. R5 will be "STU only". The FMG will be writing up a complete description of what that means, including projected timelines for R6 and will share it sometime later next week. Discussion/questions on #social or #committers
